meanings.definition: The quality of causing displeasure or resentment.
meanings.sent1: Her offensiveness towards others made them avoid her.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's offensiveness crossed the line and upset many audience members.
meanings.sent3: Despite his offensiveness, he always managed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The offensiveness of his remarks left a bitter taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent5: The offensiveness of the situation lingered in the air long after the argument ended.

meanings.definition: The state of being insulting or morally unacceptable.
meanings.sent1: The offensiveness of his comments shocked everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The offensiveness of the graffiti on the wall was quickly removed.
meanings.sent3: Despite the offensiveness of the situation, she managed to keep her cool.
meanings.sent4: The offensiveness of his behavior was a clear sign of his lack of respect.
meanings.sent5: The offensiveness of the joke made everyone cringe in discomfort.
